scenario.mission: You may only edit the green listing. To generate a highscore you need to overcome the blue shielded cores and overwrite the red cores that are programmed to decrease score. 25k or higher is possible!

deck.listing:
QSE _a IFG _a !F0 NXT decrease_score ISE !F NXT 0
decrease_score: DSC !F NXT 0
_a: 0

evaluate: TGT !0 QSE _a IFS _a NXT drill
RDW _a 0 IFE _a !A101 NXT friend_ahead
prepare_copy: SIP 85 SET _a !0 copy: STW ~_a ~_a INC _a IFL _a !end NXT copy
IFE 0 !A101 NXT boost turn: INC 0 NXT evaluate
boost: BST !F NXT boost
drill: WKN !F SIP F NXT evaluate
friend_ahead: IFE 0 !A100 NXT turn score: ISC !F NXT score
end:
_a: 0 _turned:
